thread.section_title: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice Hotel -
thread.title_full: Nice Hotel - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London - West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Andy N
title: Nice Hotel -
text:
Staff were excellent here from Check in, Bar staff, night staff to breakfast also. Hilton should be proud of them all at this hotel.
Hotel itself is ok, the bar area is good as is the entrance but the room was a little disappointing if I'm honest. Expected a little more but don't get me wrong it is a nice hotel and has every standard feature.
Location is nice and central and only a 5min walk from Holborn station.
Has breakfast and that was a good wide choice.
